va#r.ShEdanupariqhAra(gm)# sAdayatiq tasmAqth sarvA#nRuqtUn. va#r.Shati purOvAtaqsani#-raqsItyA#haiqtadvai vRuShTyai# rUqpa(gm) rUqpENaiqva vRuShTiqmava# rundhE saqM~MyAnI#Biqrvai dEqvA iqmAn ~MlOqkAnth sama#yuqstath saqM~MyAnI#nA(gm) saM~MyAniqtvaM ~Myath saqM~MyAnI#rupaqdadhA#tiq yathAq&Psu nAqvA saqM~MyAtyEqva - [  ] 40
